content.text: The solid below is made up of 1-cm cubes. [Diagram: A 3D isometric drawing of a solid object constructed from 1-cm cubes. The solid has a base that appears to be 3 units wide and 3 units deep. From the front, it has a shape that rises in steps. An arrow points to the front view, indicating the perspective for part (b). The solid consists of 10 cubes: a bottom layer with 3 cubes in the front row, 2 in the middle, and 1 in the back; a second layer with 2 cubes in the front row and 1 in the middle; and a top layer with 1 cube in the front row.]
